discription: Sudden inflammation of stomach and intestines causing diarrhea, vomiting, and abdominal cramps.
causes: Commonly caused by rotavirus, norovirus, contaminated food/water, or bacterial toxins.
remedy: Rehydration therapy, electrolyte replacement, safe food practices; antibiotics only for bacterial cases.

discription: Progressive degeneration of motor neurons leading to muscle weakness and paralysis.
causes: Mostly idiopathic; some cases linked to SOD1 or C9orf72 gene mutations.
remedy: Riluzole, edaravone, respiratory support, physiotherapy, assistive devices.

discription: Chronic airway inflammation causing wheezing, chest tightness, and reversible airflow obstruction.
causes: Allergens, pollution, exercise, respiratory infections, genetic predisposition.
remedy: Inhaled corticosteroids, bronchodilators, trigger avoidance, asthma action plan.

discription: Progressive loss of kidney function affecting filtration and waste removal.
causes: Diabetes, hypertension, glomerulonephritis, polycystic kidney disease.
remedy: Blood pressure control, glucose control, dialysis in late stages, renal diet.

discription: Long‑term liver damage causing fibrosis and impaired liver function.
causes: Alcohol abuse, hepatitis B/C, fatty liver disease, autoimmune liver disorders.
remedy: Avoid alcohol, antiviral therapy, weight loss, liver‑protective medications.

discription: Late‑stage liver scarring causing portal hypertension and liver failure.
causes: Chronic hepatitis, alcohol abuse, NAFLD, autoimmune hepatitis.
remedy: Manage complications, low‑salt diet, diuretics, liver transplant for severe cases.

discription: Viral infection of upper respiratory tract causing runny nose, cough, sneezing.
causes: Rhinovirus most common; spread via droplets.
remedy: Rest, hydration, antihistamines, decongestants.

discription: Chronic airflow limitation due to lung damage.
remedy: Bronchodilators, inhaled steroids, smoking cessation, pulmonary rehab.

discription: Narrowing of coronary arteries reducing blood flow to heart.
causes: Atherosclerosis from high cholesterol, smoking, diabetes, hypertension.
remedy: Statins, antiplatelets, angioplasty, lifestyle modifications.

discription: Viral respiratory illness causing fever, cough, and breathing difficulty.
remedy: Antivirals, supportive oxygen therapy, vaccination, isolation.

discription: Chronic inflammatory bowel disease affecting any part of GI tract.
remedy: Immunosuppressants, biologics, corticosteroids, surgery in complications.

discription: Genetic disorder causing thick mucus buildup in lungs and pancreas.
causes: CFTR gene mutation affecting chloride transport.
remedy: Airway clearance, pancreatic enzymes, CFTR modulators.

discription: Mosquito‑borne viral infection causing high fever and severe body pain.
causes: Aedes aegypti mosquito transmitting dengue virus.
remedy: Hydration, fever control, monitoring for shock; no NSAIDs.

discription: Mood disorder with persistent sadness, loss of interest, and fatigue.
remedy: SSRIs, psychotherapy, lifestyle regulation.

discription: Connective tissue disorder causing hyperflexible joints and fragile skin.
remedy: Pain management, physiotherapy, joint protection.

discription: Neurological condition with recurrent unprovoked seizures.
causes: Genetic factors, brain injury, infections, metabolic issues.
remedy: Antiepileptic drugs, ketogenic diet, surgery for refractory cases.

discription: Inherited bone marrow failure disorder causing low blood cell counts, skeletal abnormalities, and cancer risk.
causes: Mutations in DNA repair genes (FANCA, FANCC, FANCG).
remedy: Bone marrow transplant, androgen therapy, supportive transfusions.

discription: Acute viral respiratory infection with fever, cough, sore throat, and body aches.
causes: Influenza A or B virus transmitted by droplets.
remedy: Antivirals (oseltamivir), rest, hydration, annual flu vaccination.

discription: Inflammation of stomach lining causing pain, nausea, and indigestion.
causes: H. pylori infection, NSAIDs, alcohol, stress.
remedy: PPIs, H. pylori eradication, avoiding irritant foods.

discription: Lysosomal storage disorder leading to enlarged spleen/liver and bone problems.
causes: GBA gene mutation causing glucocerebrosidase deficiency.
remedy: Enzyme replacement therapy (imiglucerase), substrate reduction therapy.

discription: Chronic excessive worry with restlessness, irritability, and muscle tension.
remedy: CBT therapy, SSRIs, lifestyle regulation.

discription: Persistent high blood pressure affecting cardiovascular health.
causes: Salt intake, obesity, genetics, kidney disease.
remedy: ACE inhibitors, lifestyle changes, low‑salt diet.

discription: Overactive thyroid causing weight loss, palpitations, and heat intolerance.
causes: Graves' disease, thyroid nodules, excess iodine.
remedy: Antithyroid drugs, beta‑blockers, radioactive iodine.

discription: Underactive thyroid causing fatigue, weight gain, and cold intolerance.
remedy: Levothyroxine replacement therapy.

discription: Chronic GI inflammation including Crohn’s disease and ulcerative colitis.
remedy: Immunosuppressants, biologics, dietary management.

discription: Functional bowel disorder with abdominal pain and altered bowel habits.
causes: Gut‑brain axis dysfunction, stress, food triggers.
remedy: Dietary modification (low FODMAP), antispasmodics, probiotics.

discription: Connective tissue disorder affecting heart, eyes, and skeleton.
remedy: Beta‑blockers, aortic monitoring, corrective surgery.

discription: Cluster of conditions including obesity, hypertension, high glucose, and high triglycerides.
remedy: Weight loss, exercise, lipid‑lowering and glucose‑lowering medications.

discription: Recurrent throbbing headaches with nausea and light sensitivity.
causes: Genetic predisposition, hormonal changes, stress triggers.
remedy: Triptans, NSAIDs, preventive medications (beta‑blockers, topiramate).

discription: Autoimmune demyelinating disorder affecting the central nervous system.
causes: Immune attack on myelin, genetics, low vitamin D.
remedy: Disease‑modifying therapies, steroids for relapse, physiotherapy.

discription: Lysosomal storage disorder causing lipid accumulation in organs.
causes: Mutations in SMPD1 or NPC1/NPC2 genes.
remedy: Supportive therapy, miglustat for type C.

discription: Excess body fat negatively affecting overall health.
remedy: Calorie restriction, exercise, weight‑loss medications, bariatric surgery.

discription: Degeneration of joint cartilage causing pain and stiffness.
remedy: Pain relievers, physiotherapy, joint replacement for advanced cases.

discription: Increased bone density due to defective bone resorption.
remedy: Vitamin D, bone marrow transplant for severe forms.

discription: Sores in stomach or duodenal lining causing burning pain.
remedy: PPIs, H. pylori eradication therapy, avoid NSAIDs.

discription: Infection of lung tissue causing fever, cough, chest pain.
remedy: Antibiotics if bacterial, oxygen therapy, rest.

discription: Hormonal disorder causing irregular periods and ovarian cysts.
remedy: Metformin, lifestyle change, hormonal therapy.

discription: Autoimmune skin disease causing scaly patches.
remedy: Topical steroids, phototherapy, biologics.

discription: Genetic disorder causing muscle weakness due to motor neuron loss.
remedy: Nusinersen, gene therapy, physiotherapy.

discription: Reduced brain blood supply causing neurological deficits.
remedy: Thrombolysis, rehabilitation, BP control.

discription: Autoimmune disease affecting skin, joints, kidneys, and more.
remedy: Steroids, immunosuppressants, sun protection.

discription: Chronic lung infection causing cough and weight loss.
remedy: RIPE therapy (rifampicin, isoniazid, pyrazinamide, ethambutol).

discription: Metabolic disorder causing high blood sugar due to insulin resistance.
remedy: Metformin, diet control, exercise, insulin if needed.

discription: Bacterial infection causing prolonged fever and abdominal pain.
remedy: Antibiotics, hydration, vaccines for prevention.

discription: Inflammation of colon lining causing bloody diarrhea.
remedy: 5‑ASA drugs, steroids, biologics, surgery if needed.

discription: Infection of bladder or urethra causing burning urination.
remedy: Antibiotics, hydration, hygiene practices.
